items.sentence: I think Tom lived in Boston when he was in high school.
Tom said I didn't speak French well enough for the job.
Tom said he knew Mary was having a good time in Boston.
Tom said he was planning to stay in Boston next summer.
Tom is pretty good at singing, but he can't read music.
The weather has been beautiful for the past three days.
Tom used to hang out with his friends in his treehouse.
Tom rang the doorbell three times, but no one answered.
If we want to achieve something, we have to take risks.
We haven't done that, nor do we have any plan to do so.
